recipe.title: Seasoned Salt Blend Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 3 tablespoons ; pink himalayan salt, whole crystals

steps.step: Add the salt crystals and peppercorns to a mortar and pestle, and crush into a fine powder.
Add the chili powder, paprika, onion powder, and garlic powder, and mix until well combined.
Sprinkle on vegetables, popcorn, and more!

Add the chili powder, paprika, onion powder, and garlic powder, and mix until well combined.
Sprinkle on vegetables, popcorn, and more!
